arts.ttl: Pepi nets PSV hat trick to top Dutch scoring charts
arts.sum: United States striker Ricardo Pepi continued his rich vein of scoring form, netting a hat trick in PSV Eindhoven's 5-0 victory over FC Groningen in the Dutch Eredivisie Saturday.

arts.ttl: Eredivisie Round Up: Pepi hattrick as PSV rout Groningen and Feyenoord down Heerenveen
arts.sum: There were five matches in the Eredivisie on Saturday and below is a round up of all the action. Go Ahead Eagles 3-0 Almere City Go Ahead Eagles had no trouble with defeating Almere City on Saturday afternoon.
